eeta amatharawa 1978 anka 16 wishwa widyala panathe 25 kotasa yatathe upadhi pirinamana aayathanayak lesa wishwa widyala prathipadana komishan sabhawa magin piliganu labana usas adhyapana aayathanayaki. 2005 wasaredi shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaya wisin eya wishwa widyala prathipadana komishan sabhawe nirdesha matha jathika samaja sanwardhana aayathanaya upadhi pirinamana usas adhyapana aayathanayak lesa piliganu labu athara inpasu samaja wada pilibanda shasthrawedi upadhiya pirinamima arambauni. 2008 wasaredi mema aayathanaya wethin samaja wada pilibanda shasthrapathi upadhiya pawathwagena yama sandaha wishesha gasat pathrayak magin anumathiya laba di atha.

ema nawa aayathanaye wyuhaya ha balathala 17 wana sanshedhanaya mangin handunwadun aayathanaye wyuhayata ha balathalawalata wada idirigami thathwayaka pawathi. 41.a(1) wyawasthawa anuwa mema aandukrama wyawastha sabhawe samajikayan wanne agamathiwaraya, kathanayakawaraya, wipakshanayakawaraya, janadhipathiwaraya pathkarana parlimenthu manthriwarayek, agamathiwaraya ho wipakshanayakawaraya ho niyojanaya karana pakshaye ho swadhina kandayame ho nowana parlimenthuwe sesu paksha ha swadhina kandayam wala ekangathwaya matha nam karana lada manthriwarayek, agamathi ha wipakshanayakawarayage namayojana matha janadhipathiwaraya wisin path karana lada dedenek parlimenthu manthriwaru wana thanaththak pas denek ya.

3 wana awasthawa janawargika prashnaya ithamath sarthaka lesa ithamath pahasuwen wisanda ganimata eelanga aithihasika awasthawa udawuye 1972 nawa janaraja aandukrama panatha sammatha karagath awasthawediya. 1970 maha mathiwaranayata idiripath wu shri lanka nidahas pakshaya, lanka samasamajawadi pakshaya ha shri lankawe komiyunist pakshaya athulu samagi peramuna thama mathiwarana prakashaya magin janathawagen illa sitiye pawathina solbari aandukrama panatha ahosi kota “janaraja panathak” sammatha kara ganimata parlimenthuwe 2/3 kata wadi balayak thama peramunata labadena lesayi.
